name: Vishnu Sahasranam
title: Shri Vishnu Sahasranamam
description: A sacred hymn consisting of 1000 names of Lord Vishnu, as revealed in the Mahabharata. This powerful stotram is considered one of the most important devotional texts in Hinduism, invoking the supreme qualities of Lord Vishnu.
significance: Brings peace, prosperity, and spiritual liberation. Regular recitation removes sins and grants divine blessings.

seo.description: Complete Vishnu Sahasranamam with 1000 names of Lord Vishnu, meaning, and benefits. Learn the proper way to recite Vishnu Sahasranam.

sections.title: Shri Vishnu Sahasranamam
sections.content: The Vishnu Sahasranamam is a sacred compilation of 1000 divine names of Lord Vishnu, each describing his supreme qualities, powers, and manifestations.

sections.title: Historical Significance
sections.content: The Vishnu Sahasranamam appears in the Anushasana Parva of the Mahabharata, where Bhishma teaches it to Yudhishthira. It has been revered for thousands of years as a powerful spiritual practice.

sections.title: Key Names and Their Meanings
sections.content: Some of the most important names from the 1000 names with their meanings.

subsections.title: Opening Verses
subsections.english:
I worship Vishnu, who wears white garments, is all-pervading, has a moon-like complexion, four arms, and is peaceful.

I worship Vishnu, who is the universe, the supreme deity, the imperishable, the supreme good, the lord of all, eternal, the basis of all existence, and the lord of beings.
subsections.meaning: These opening verses establish the divine nature of Lord Vishnu as the supreme reality.

subsections.title: First 50 Names
subsections.english:
Vishnu, the all-pervading, the supreme, the glorious, the unobstructed,
Immeasurable, Lord of the senses, lotus-navelled, immortal lord,

Creator of the universe, skilled, master of skills, soul of the universe,
Golden point, upholder of righteousness, wise, physician, contemplative,

Existence-knowledge-bliss, lord of the universe, lord of wealth, victorious over wealth,
Victorious, source of victory, worthy of worship, worshipped, lord of Indra.
subsections.meaning: These names describe Vishnu's various qualities as the supreme creator, sustainer, and source of all prosperity.

sections.title: Benefits of Reciting Vishnu Sahasranamam
sections.content: The spiritual and practical benefits of regular recitation.

subsections.title: Spiritual Benefits
subsections.content: Attains spiritual liberation, removes all sins, provides divine protection, and brings peace of mind.

subsections.title: Material Benefits
subsections.content: Brings prosperity, success, good health, and removes obstacles from life's path.

sections.title: How to Recite
sections.content: Proper method and guidelines for reciting Vishnu Sahasranamam.

subsections.title: Best Time
subsections.content: Early morning after bath, especially on Ekadashi and other auspicious days.

subsections.title: Procedure
subsections.content: Sit facing east, light a diya, offer tulsi leaves and flowers, then recite with devotion and understanding of the meanings.
